casebody.data:
KOTICK BOAT COMPANY, Libelant-Appellee, v. Gasoline Yacht NATALON II; James D. Hurd, Claimant-Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 19, 1927. No. 79. Shearman & Sterling, of New York City (Horace M. Gray and Sanford H. E. Ereund, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. 'William E. Purdy, of New York City (Thomas A. McDonald, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with costs.
